8.11 DUIM-Gadgets Module

status-bar-progress-bar

Generic function

Summary

Returns the progress bar for the specified status bar.

Signature

status-bar-progress-bar status-bar => progress-bar

Arguments

status-bar
An instance of type <status-bar>.

Values

progress-bar
An instance of type false-or(<progress-bar>).

Library

duim-gadgets

Module

duim-gadgets

Description

Returns the progress bar for status-bar, if there is one.

See also

<progress-bar>, page 625

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
